none: Map of the State of California
Map of the State of California

Description: A map of the state of California with a complete delineation of the gold region. The map is compiled from the most recent surveys and explorations and contains an accurate description of the county boundaries. It also shows a complete list of post offices in the state in 1851 and a portion of the Great Basin. 

Accession Number: 1982/004/0401

Collection: Eleanor McClatchy Collection

Publisher: Butler, B.F. 

Date Published: 1851

Dimensions: 20 x 26 in
